title: Installing Saas Kit
label: Installing Saas Kit
description: Learn how to install Saas Kit on your local machine

body.raw:
If you have bought a license for Saas Kit, you have access to all the
repositories built by the Saas Kit team. In this document, we will learn how
to fetch and install the codebase.

### Requirements

To get started with the Next.js and Supabase SaaS template, we need to ensure
you install the required software.

- Node.js
- Git
- Docker

### Installing the Node dependencies

Finally, we can install the NodeJS dependencies with `npm`:

```
npm i
```

While the application code is fully working, we now need to set up your Supabase
project.

So let's jump on to the next step!

structuredData.headline: Installing Saas Kit
structuredData.description: Learn how to install Saas Kit on your local machine
